basics.name: Chayanika Devi
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a M.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in 2026.

work.company: John A. Burns School of Medicine
highlights: Brain tumor landmark detetcion and segmentation
Research and maintain a variety of spatial and associated attribute data for the city,municipal boundaries, parcel, addressing, zoning, land use, subdivision, vacant land, and other data layers
Collaborate successfully on manuscript writing and participated in lab meetings and presentations

awards.title: Graduate Scholarships
awards.summary: Awarded a WiGIS scholarship from Women in GIS, USA, sponsored by ESRI, for the academic year 2023-2024.

awards.title: Kindness Champion Award Winners
awards.summary: Kindness is a gift everyone can give every day not only to others, but also to ourselves.
